channel.title: Custom item working but not working in server

item.title: Custom item working but not working in server
item.dc:creator: @Ripvayne Ripvayne
item.description:
@Ripvayne wrote:

class8.anInt174 = 15000; // Drop/Inv Model
class8.anInt165 = 15000; // Male Wield Model
class8.anInt200 = 15000; // Female Wield
class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used)
class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used)

I’m guessing. Unless you change the
if(i == 15000) //
to something else.

But you’ll have to make some edits to the model for the Drop model.

There’s a good chance that I’m a bit off. I’ve only told you what I know about adding models. I myself have never added one.

Read full topic
item.source: Custom item working but not working in server

item.title: Custom item working but not working in server
item.dc:creator: @k0_gawd_k0 k0 gawd k0
item.description:
@k0_gawd_k0 wrote:

yes but… all i need to do is somehow make these :

class8.anInt174 = #####; // Drop/Inv Model
class8.anInt165 = #####; // Male Wield Model
class8.anInt200 = #####; // Female Wield
class8.anInt188 = #####; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used)
class8.anInt164 = #####; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used)

the #### of all them need to be changed to match my item, but i dont know how to find what they are… how do i figure out how to get them for an item?

item.title: Custom item working but not working in server
item.dc:creator: @k0_gawd_k0 k0 gawd k0
item.description:
@k0_gawd_k0 wrote:

ok i made a custom ice platebody. i added in class8. when i compile and run and log in i try to spawn the ice platebody and it shows a dragon chain body? this is my ints :

if(i == 15000) // Your desired item id (the one you use after ::pickup 15000 1)
{
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wear”;//New option
class8.anIntArray156 = new int[2];
class8.anIntArray160 = new int[2];
class8.anIntArray156[0] = 74;
class8.anIntArray160[0] = 37340;
class8.anIntArray156[1] = 28;
class8.anIntArray160[1] = 37444;
class8.anInt174 = 2605; // Drop/Inv Model
class8.anInt165 = 306; // Male Wield Model
class8.anInt200 = 468; // Female Wield
class8.anInt188 = 164; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used)
class8.anInt164 = 344; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used)
class8.anInt181 = 800; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller
class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards
class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right
class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right
class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up
class8.aString170 = “ice platebody”; // Item Name
class8.aByteArray178 = “Ice platebody from ice queen!”.getBytes(); // Item Examine
}

if you can help me, could you also explain so i dont have to keep bugging people to do it for me? i can just do myself.

Read full topic
